```{python}
from core.helpers import summarize
Boston = pd.read_csv("data/Boston.csv")
X = pd.DataFrame({'intercept': np.ones(Boston.shape[0]),
                  'lstat': Boston['lstat']})
y = Boston['medv']
model = sm.OLS(y, X)
results = model.fit()
summarize(results)
```
